Function.Description: The refLibrarian function returns the Librarian Lambda attached to the specified ObjectRepository database archive file.

Brief.Overview: The refLibrarian function returns the Librarian Lambda attached to the specified ObjectRepository database archive file {aGor}. If no Librarian Lambda is attached, #void is returned.
Brief.Usage: The refLibrarian is used to query the Object Repository for the Librarian Lambda attached to it.

Syntax.Return: Returns the Librarian Lambda or #void if no Lambda is attached.
